Deficiency Narrative: Residential Child Care Regulation observed four staff files to be without pre employment drug testing documentation. The operation indicated they don't perform such tests.
Correction Narrative:
06-05-2024. The assigned inspector reviewed all drug test results emailed by the operation and telephoned the operation to ask about the four employees in CLASS people list who don't have tests. The operation indicated they are being considered for employment and are not yet at the drug test phase of the hiring process. The inspector also telephoned two employees who verified they had drug tests. 

05-31-2024. The assigned inspector requested documentation of the compliance response.

05-17-2024. The operation submitted a compliance response: "745.4151 - Home of Joseph Foundation will perform mandatory drug testing on all applicants intended to be hired for employment in accordance with Rule 745.4151. All staff at Home of Joseph Foundation will complete drug testing by 5/22/24. (Complete, please note all employees have been tested and supporting documentation can be provided upon request)."
